ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Froglok  Ton Totem!
ygData.msgSnippet: As a shaman, i can say that the Journeyman boots are not always slower.  My shaman is 29th and a lvl 50 mag with journeyman boots could easily outrun me.  I
ygData.messageBody:
As a shaman, i can say that the Journeyman boots are
not always slower. My shaman is 29th and a lvl 50 mag
with journeyman boots could easily outrun me. I was
following him and he had to stop every now and then
for me to catch up. I asked him how he was gong so
fast and he said all he had was journeyman boots. I
was not encumbered and it was not a lag thing. I am
inclined to think that the sow effect you recieve from
the journeyman boots is actually based on the level of
the person wearing them. i.e. if journeyman had the
effect of a lvl 9 sow then my 29 shaman would be
pretty upset that he can't outrun that mage :)

Just some more info.

Anacton

--- "Whitcraft,David" <dwhitcraft@...> wrote:
> Journeyman's boots are the booties ye be speaking
> of. Tis a quest. The boots
> will give you a form of level 9ish or so Spirit of
> the Wolf (SoW gets faster
> as the caster goes up in levels, the JBoots sow is
> slower than 99% of the
> SoWs you'll get from players, but faster than 95% of
> the mobs in the game).
>
>


=====
The more you know,
The more you know how much you don't know!
